pageContent: Yes. So being that Im kind of still kind of new to the opportunity, I would say 100,000 is feasible based upon the knowledge that I do have and then also the knowledge that Ill receive as well. But I would say 100 plus. But Im open to more just to scale it up and to grow it as much as you can grow. But thats what Ill go with for starters. Just 100,000 per month.

To run that business and be successful once you get into it, to maintain it and to keep it going for as long as you want or need to. I love that.

I feel like Im still fairly young, but then Im not that young. So I was like, of, I need to start now because then I want to set myself up and my wifes up for success financially. And then also I want to set my kids up for success too. Give them opportunities to take advantage of as soon as they can or at a good age, and then just give us options. Different options is what Im looking at right now.
Yes. Its 605. Not really that good.
Yes, but they keep me in order. They keep me going and keep me on my toes and keep me doing what I need to be doing, too.

I guess kind of based on what I was saying, having the time, and time is money, not just money within itself. And that will free me up more time to dedicate to opportunities like yours and do some of the other things that I explained as far as, like, the needs, first of all, thats priority. And then also the once. I mean, sometimes the once is kind of a need because you need to kind of take a break here and there and do things with your family, kind of get out of the normal routine, daily routine. Your wants kind of becomes a need, too. So you need to need a balance and need to pace yourself. And to me, just think off the top of me thats some of the ways I think I could do it. Or maybe just go to a social event here locally, like a zoo or I dont know, an event they might have at school, social gathering, things of that nature.

And then at once, I dont know, maybe going on a vacation somewhere or taking a trip, doing something locally. Yeah, just kind of go with the flow like that. I would say.
